### Government Tender Announcement
#### Tender Notice: EN438-241003
##### EN438-241003 - UXO Risk Management Services
**Reference Number:**  WS4402383087-Doc4405368908
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Solicitation Number:** WS4402383087
**Publication Date:** 2024-03-08
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-05 14:00:00

We hereby invite bids for tender notice [EN438-241003 - UXO Risk Management Services](#). The Department of National Defence requires up to two (2) Task Authorization Contracts (TACs) to conduct Unexploded Explosive Ordnance (UXO) risk management, risk mitigation and site characterization activities at legacy sites and other property owned by the Department of National Defence located throughout Canada.

#### Tender Description
This tender notice provides instruction for bidders wishing to provide UXO risk management services. We invite eligible bidders to submit proposals in accordance with the requirements outlined in this tender notice.

**Eligibility Criteria**
- Bidders may be invited to participate in further competition once, bidder contact information, business profiles and pass capability assessments will be validated by the contracting authority.

**Location**
Services will be performed throughout Canada, excluding locations within Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, and Labrador that are subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs).

**Procurement Category:** SRV
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Trade Agreements:** The contractor is required to comply with all applicable trade agreements:

- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
